mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user macu WHERE user_id =#{userId} AND macu.`status` = 0

SELECT mac.coupon_name AS 'couponName', mac.base_amount AS 'baseAmount', mac.coupon_money AS 'couponMoney', mac.coupon_type AS 'couponType', mac.used_type AS 'usedType', ma.expiration_date AS 'expirationDate' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user macu LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon mac ON macu.coupon_id = mac.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity ma ON mac.action_id = ma.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND macu.`status` = 0
